name: Vegas Shoot-Out
description:
March 7, 2014
Ghost Town of Nelson, NV 
$200.00
Shoot-Out held in Nelson, NV

A highly styled 3 hour shoot in the Ghost Town of Nelson, NV with several models wearing wardrobe custom designed for this shoot by Jessica Ordway-Worley of Frills n’ Frippery. 
 
More information: 
Class space is limited to 20 attendee’s per. This is not a workshop with instruction.  Shoot outs are three to four hours in length. Our model releases will cover all photographers in attendance and will be delivered via email the day following your workshop.  Transportation to the shoot will be provided.

Each participant will be asked to provide 3 edited, watermarked images for vendors/future advertisement.  

PLEASE NOTE: A $200 payment is due upon booking.  Refunds will only be awarded for cancellations done 30 days or more before event.  For more information please contact me directly: ken@kengehringphotography.com 

** Clickin’ with Ken Gehring Workshops is a division of Ken Gehring Photography. Ken Gehring Photography reserves the right to cancel any workshop 30 days prior to the event if seats are not filled, in which case a full refund will be provided.  Details and availability subject to change.

http://www.frillsnfrippery.com/
https://www.facebook.com/FrillsnFrippery
http://www.ghosttowns.com/states/nv/nelson.html

name: One-on-One Mentoring with Ken Gehring
description:
1 Day Mentoring - $650.00 (Contact for availability)

One on one mentoring with me includes a six hour day (lunch included) shooting and then post processing images from that day. It’s a behind the scenes look at my entire process from beginning to end! Including session preparation, working, posing and interacting with subjects and all the exciting steps that go into choosing the final images and then bringing those selected photos to life with Lightroom, Photoshop and some of my favorite post processing recipes! 

What is needed: A DSLR and a prime lens. After booking your class we will have an initial consultation over the phone and discuss what you are hoping to take away and learn from your one on one mentoring session with me. 

If traveling in, I will offer recommendations for lodging in the area. I would also love to see your portfolio in advance in order to understand your strengths and weaknesses in order for you to get the most out of our time.

name: Clickin' with Ken Gehring Workshop/Tacoma, WA
description:
Saturday, June 21, 2014
Tacoma, WA
$499

This workshop will focus on engagement, children and seniors sessions shot in and around the stunning landscape of Tacoma, WA.  Planned locations include a beach session, an urban/inner city shoot at a local artist painted garage and the steps of a spanish mission.  

Include in tuition: 
lunch/snacks provided 
business discussion with publication submission links  
Invite to private FB group for workshop attendees only 
Swag Bag of goodies from my favorite vendors

Whether you are looking to break outside your comfort zone, interested in creating a new niche in your area, or simply wanting to add to your portfolio, Clickin’ with Ken Gehring Workshops are an undeniably unique experience to help give your portfolio an edge in your market!

With highly stylized concepts from Pinup, High Fashion, Bridal and so much more, each city we visit will deliver the ultimate portfolio building experience complete with beautiful models, exquisite venues, and an all-around awesome time! Plus some pretty fabulous SWAG!

More information: 
Each location will feature at least two highly stylized shoots along with a fun and interactive networking experience! Some of the workshops have guest artist that will offer another perspective to the learning experience. Class space is limited to 10 attendees per location. Workshops are six to eight hours in length and include lunch. Ken will be available for questions throughout the day and provide live instruction and guidance. Our model releases will cover all photographers in attendance and will be delivered via email the day following your workshop.

After you have attended your Clickin’ with Ken Gehring Workshop you will be invited to join a private Facebook group open exclusively to attendees! In this group you will be able to share images, receive CC, network with other attendees and continue learning and perfecting your craft amongst a group of your peers who believe in you and want to see you succeed!

PLEASE NOTE: A $200 deposit is due upon booking with the remaining balance due no later than 30 days prior to the event date. Refunds will only be awarded for cancellations done 30 days or more before event.  For more information please contact me directly: ken@kengehringphotography.com 
QUESTIONS: Email Ken at: ken@kengehringphotography.com

** Clickin’ with Ken Gehring Workshops is a division of Ken Gehring Photography. Ken Gehring Photography reserves the right to cancel any workshop 30 days prior to the event if seats are not filled. A full refund will be provided. Details and availability subject to change.
